long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
VTab - Daily View Tab: Your Personalized New Tab Experience

Experience the power of AI-powered search right in your new tab! Seamlessly switch between ChatGPT and Perplexity AI search without changing your browser's default search engine. Get intelligent, context-aware answers to your queries instantly.

New in V0.0.9:
- Easily customize your location for accurate weather information.

Daily View Tab is a feature-rich new tab extension designed to enhance your browsing experience and boost productivity. It brings together your most-used features and information in a beautifully crafted interface, inspiring you to start each day with efficiency and creativity.

Key Features:

1. Stunning Backgrounds: Enjoy high-quality daily images from Unsplash, adding a touch of beauty to your browser.
2. Quick Access: Customize shortcuts to your favorite websites for instant navigation.
3. Advanced Search Integration: Switch between multiple search engines including ChatGPT and Perplexity AI for intelligent, AI-powered search results without changing your browser's default search settings.
4. Weather Forecast: Stay informed with real-time weather conditions and forecasts to plan your day effectively. Easily customize your location for accurate weather information.
5. Word of the Day: Expand your vocabulary with a new word each day.
6. Bookmark Bar: Access and organize your browser bookmarks efficiently.
7. Handy Notes: Capture ideas and to-dos on the fly, ensuring your thoughts are always within reach.
8. Pomodoro Timer: Boost your productivity with an integrated timer for effective time management.
9. Zen Mode: Automatically enters a distraction-free mode with elegant clock display after a period of inactivity, helping you stay focused and mindful.
10. Smart Theme Adaptation: Choose between light, dark, or system-based themes to match your preferences and operating system settings.
11. Multi-language Support: Enjoy a fully localized experience with automatic language detection and customizable language settings.
12. Customizable Settings: Tailor your new tab experience by:
    - Adjusting background refresh frequency
    - Managing custom backgrounds
    - Setting your preferred language
    - Customizing theme preferences
    - Enabling or disabling features according to your needs

Daily View Tab is more than just a new tab page; it's your personal assistant for efficient work and life. It seamlessly blends aesthetics with functionality, giving each day a fresh start. Install now and embark on your smart browsing journey!

Note: This extension requires access to your bookmarks and storage permissions to provide a complete feature set. We strictly protect your privacy and do not collect or share any personal information.

How to Access Settings:
- Method 1: Right-click anywhere on the page and select "Settings" from the context menu
- Method 2: Move your cursor to the top-right corner and click the gear icon that appears

In the settings panel, you can:
- Customize extension features
- Adjust interface appearance
- Manage your preferences
